org.apromore.plugin

Interface PropertyAwarePlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Plugin
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPropertyAwarePlugin

    public interface PropertyAwarePlugin
extends Plugin
    A PropertyAwarePlugin defines a Set of properties that may or must be provided by the caller for proper operation of the Plugin.
    Author:
    Felix Mannhardt (Bonn-Rhein-Sieg University oAS)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<PropertyType<?>> getAvailableProperties()
      Returns the Set of all available properties for this Plugin.
      Set<PropertyType<?>> getMandatoryProperties()
      Returns the Set of all required properties for this Plugin.
      Set<PropertyType<?>> getOptionalProperties()
      Returns the Set of all optional properties for this Plugin.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apromore.plugin.Plugin

        getAuthor, getDescription, getName, getType, getVersion

    • Method Detail

      • getAvailableProperties

        Set<PropertyType<?>> getAvailableProperties()
        Returns the Set of all available properties for this Plugin.
        Returns:
        Set of PropertyType that contains both mandatory and optional properties.

      • getMandatoryProperties

        Set<PropertyType<?>> getMandatoryProperties()
        Returns the Set of all required properties for this Plugin.
        Returns:
        Set of PropertyType that are mandatory

      • getOptionalProperties

        Set<PropertyType<?>> getOptionalProperties()
        Returns the Set of all optional properties for this Plugin. That should be the result of getAvailableProperties() minus the result of getMandatoryProperties().
        Returns:
        Set of PropertyType that are optional
